item.title: Algorithm: 3. Reverse Linked List
item.description: Statement This article is my study notes about algorithms. Please refer to the original work for more details and indicate the source for reprinting. 1. How to reverse a list? We can reverse linked list in two ways, which is iteration and recursion. 1.1 Iteration 1. We define three pointer variables: prev, cur, next and header, prev points to the previous node, which points to NULL at the beginning of the iteration.
